location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Lewis Pelly, Bushire, to William Mackinnon

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the sending of coal to Muskat and identifying possible alternative locations for coal depots in the Gulf.The letter also discusses the laying of bouys in the harbour at Bushire and the entrance to the Basrah river (Shatt al Arab) as well as discussing the gun-boats and assistants that Pelly has been promised.
